overview:
I’m the CEO at DigitalXBridge aka “DXB”. Before founding DXB, I had a 12+ year career in software design, development, testing, management and sales. Beginning as a Programmer with Accenture, then moving on to the Director of Project Planning with Partsearch Technologies, and finally landing as a Sr. Project Manager with Tradition. In 2010, with the tremendous experiences I had earned and connections made, I was ready to start DXB.

DXB is a digital agency that creates websites and mobile apps. My focus is on educating brands understand how they can take advantage of web and mobile technology. I partner with our clients to analyze and mature their business concepts. I offer guidance on brand strategy as well as developing online products that sell. And finally, I coach our clients on how to build custom solutions or re-engineer ones that already exist.

Learn more about me and the team @ DXB here: http://digitalxbridge.com.
